question: StepUp for Research supports two streams of research - dementia and ageing. Which of those fields of research would the volunteer be interested in participating in?
What type of accommodation does the volunteer live in?
Does the volunteer have a carer / someone who knows them well, and who helps support them with their health issues?

How would the volunteer describe their symptoms?

Does the volunteer have any of these difficulties?
